name: CardDeckView
summary: Creates a deck like view which allows for cards to be swiped/panned, left or right, off the deck and popped back on.
description:
This will allow users to add and customize a "Bumble App" like card swiping/panning functionality to their iOS application. The cards are
fully customizable and behaves like a tableview cell does when creating a custom cell. The deck view is fully optimizing, allowing for potentially
unlimited number of cards to be traversed without dealing with memory or gpu issues
